# Transaction Reject File - Expected Output Format
# Generated by CBTRN02C equivalent Spring Batch Job
# Record Layout: Original Transaction (350 bytes) + Reject Metadata (50 bytes) = 400 bytes per record
# Fixed-width format for downstream processing and reprocessing capability

# Record 1: Reject - Invalid Transaction Type
1234567890123456  XX0001INVALID CARD                                                                            -00012345009876543210MERCHANT ABC                       CHICAGO       IL    60601    1234567890123456202312151030000020231215103000001                    INTY20231215103000012Invalid transaction type 'XX'         BATCH-001
# Record 2: Reject - Amount Exceeds Limit  
2345678901234567  PU0002CASH ADVANCE                                                                             +00050000123456789012CASH ADVANCE ATM                   NEW YORK      NY    10001    2345678901234567202312151045000020231215104500002                    AMTX20231215104500034Amount exceeds account credit limit    BATCH-001
# Record 3: Reject - Account Not Found
3456789012345678  SA0003PURCHASE                                                                                +00002500999999999999ONLINE STORE XYZ                   LOS ANGELES   CA    90210    3456789012345678202312151100000020231215110000003                    ACNF20231215110000056Account ID not found in database       BATCH-001
# Record 4: Reject - Invalid Card Number
4567890123456789  PU0004PURCHASE                                                                                +00001750111111111111GAS STATION 24/7                   HOUSTON       TX    77001    INVALID_CARD_NUM202312151115000020231215111500004                    CARD20231215111500078Invalid card number format            BATCH-001
# Record 5: Reject - Transaction Date Invalid
5678901234567890  PU0001PURCHASE                                                                                +00003200234567890123RESTAURANT GOOD EATS                DALLAS        TX    75201    5678901234567890INVALID_DATE    20231215112000005                    DATE20231215112000090Transaction date format invalid        BATCH-001

# Field Layout Reference:
# Positions   1-16   : TRAN-ID (Transaction ID)
# Positions  17-18   : TRAN-TYPE-CD (Transaction Type Code)  
# Positions  19-22   : TRAN-CAT-CD (Transaction Category Code)
# Positions  23-32   : TRAN-SOURCE (Transaction Source)
# Positions  33-132  : TRAN-DESC (Transaction Description)
# Positions 133-143  : TRAN-AMT (Transaction Amount, signed with 2 decimal places)
# Positions 144-152  : TRAN-MERCHANT-ID (Merchant ID)
# Positions 153-202  : TRAN-MERCHANT-NAME (Merchant Name)
# Positions 203-252  : TRAN-MERCHANT-CITY (Merchant City)
# Positions 253-262  : TRAN-MERCHANT-ZIP (Merchant ZIP Code)
# Positions 263-278  : TRAN-CARD-NUM (Card Number)
# Positions 279-304  : TRAN-ORIG-TS (Original Timestamp)
# Positions 305-330  : TRAN-PROC-TS (Processing Timestamp)
# Positions 331-350  : FILLER (20 bytes reserved)
# Positions 351-354  : REJECT-REASON-CODE (4 character reason code)
# Positions 355-368  : REJECT-TIMESTAMP (YYYYMMDDHHMISS format)
# Positions 369-371  : ERROR-DETAIL-LENGTH (3 digit length)
# Positions 372-411  : VALIDATION-ERROR-DETAILS (40 chars max)
# Positions 412-420  : PROCESSING-BATCH-ID (9 chars)

# Reject Reason Codes:
# INTY - Invalid Transaction Type
# AMTX - Amount Exceeds Limit  
# ACNF - Account Not Found
# CARD - Invalid Card Number
# DATE - Invalid Date Format
# MERCH - Invalid Merchant Data
# AUTH - Authorization Failed
# DUPL - Duplicate Transaction
# REQF - Required Field Missing
# CATG - Invalid Category Code
